item.title: Basic information on charapagos
item.description: About charapagos Charapagos is a system to produce Cinematic Communication that is a new type of online communication with making the best use of digital characters. Demonstration You can try the demonstration of Cinematic Communication from the below URL. Please do not forget to include emotional key words like “Happy” or “Sad” in your message. Digital characters will act according to the key words. https://raw.githack.com/charapagos/interface/master/cp_demo_v2_2_3/character_selection.html The following character named Abungu can show 36 emotional and actional expressions at this moment.

item.title: Cinematic Communication
item.description: Let’s enjoy more heartfelt and lively communication! Cinematic Communication enables you to enjoy more heartfelt and lively communication with your friends and family members with a feeling of film making as its name suggests. Like a scriptwriter or choreographer you can move digital characters more dynamically. It is very easy to enable digital characters to act. You do not need to buy dedicated software for the purpose or learn complicated operation procedures.

item.title: Charm of characters to empower messages
item.description: Cinematic Communication expects characters for example ones in animation works to give more power to sentences and messages making the best use of their features including their appearance and personality. You can tell more effectively about what you want to say to your partner only because of adding the feature of a specific character on sentences or messages in some cases. If you wish to prompt a smile from your communication partner, there are more possibilities to do so through selecting a popper character appeared in a comedy work and sending encouraging words with it than only sentences or messages.

item.title: Three aims
item.description: Cinematic Communication holds up three aims. 1. Cinematic Communication will propose a more positive, heartfelt and lively communication style. These days we can see remarkable progress in both the hardware and software of mobile devices. The performance has almost achieved the same level of personal computer. You cannot make use of the technical progress fully as long as you consume it only by downloading and watching video data or sending and receiving short messages.

item.title: Realization of your imaginary world
item.description: For example, it is common that characters in animation works have features of not only their appearance but also personality as its name suggests. Users tend to have an emotional attachment to them because of these kinds of features. Then because of their emotional attachment to the characters, we can say that they also tend to love the works themselves. If they do not feel sympathy towards any characters in the works, there is almost no way for them to evaluate the works highly.

item.title: That is where creators come in
item.description: Only moving characters is not the purpose of Cinematic Communication. The purpose is to let users enjoy a new type of communication through the expression or action of characters. However, most of them have few experiences to create characters by themselves and invent how to make them express or act. Then that is where professional creators come in. Whether characters are given expression, life through being acted and value as animation or not will depend on creators’ skill.

item.title: Make the best use of digital characters
item.description: Cinematic Communication is quite compatible with 3D animation characters. Of course you can also sufficiently enjoy with 2D ones. However, 3D ones are expected to extend the possibility of Cinematic Communication furthermore. As compared with 2D characters originated in traditional animation, 3D ones are created by modeling the whole part of them from the beginning. After that it is easier to make them express and act as their feature. Cinematic Communication can follow the feature directly.

item.title: Make use of the most common technologies
item.description: Most of the technologies that support Cinematic Communication are prevailed worldwide and everybody is using them in their everyday online life. For example, they are a URL and web browser. Everybody can easily try Cinematic Communication only putting a URL automatically generated by Emotional Engine embedded in charapagos on mails, SNS, short messages, Weblog and so on. Because of using a web browser that is surely installed in personal computers or mobile devices connected with the Internet to direct characters, it is very simple for everybody to enjoy Cinematic Communication.

item.title: Overcome ecosystems
item.description: These days under the name of ecosystems many online services tend to enclose their users providing additional services including game, music or publication that are different from initial ones such as SNS or short message. We can say that this is a necessary method to make a profit from other services because most of their initial ones are provided by free. However, it is also truth that this kind of enclosing often becomes inconvenient for their users because it makes them difficult to communicate with others who use different ecosystems or keeps recommending unnecessary services.

item.title: Network structure
item.description: Cinematic Communication has a network structure that makes the best use of advantages of cloud computing and P to P technologies. The scheme doses not work to centralize in one place. It is composed of the most common Internet technologies in the world. They are a URL and web browser. It means that technically you can enjoy Cinematic Communication on any existing online services such as Weblog or SNS.

item.title: Emotional Engine
item.description: Emotional Engine embedded in charapagos is the heart of Cinematic Communication and literally driving force to make characters express and act. To be more precise, it has a function to combine emotional words or phrases in sentences that users wrote with characters’ expression or action data. Combination between emotional words and characters’ expression or action data is up to users and everybody can do it easily. Once they write sentences normally, Emotional Engine will automatically find emotional words in them and select appropriate characters’ expression or action data along with that.

item.title: Make use of online storage
item.description: Before starting Cinematic Communication, online storage is necessary to save and manage character data and exchanged messages. By means of using online storage, you can enjoy Cinematic Communication anytime, anywhere and from any devices. Not only users but also distributors do not need to set up their own server and provide their own online storage service. Cinematic Communication itself does not provide its own online storage service too. Users and distributors by themselves need to pick up service that they usually use or other one that they can trust.

item.title: Data storage location
item.description: It is necessary to use online storage service in order to save and manage character data and exchanged message data for Cinematic Communication. For example, a procedure to save character data purchased from distributors is as follows. At first you purchase character data from one distributer and save the data in your personal computer or mobile device after downloading it. Then you prepare online storage in advance and upload the data to it.

item.title: Multiply Filtering System
item.description: Multiply Filtering System is built in Emotional Engine as its main function. The system is composed of multiple filters and they are put on top of each other. Grid shaped areas are set in each filter. Expression or action data for a character is located on each grid shaped area in a filter one by one. It is called a character filter. Words or phrases that show emotion or action are also located on each grid shaped area in other filter.

item.title: Combination of filters
item.description: As its name suggests, Multiply Filtering System can combine many filters together. The basic scheme is to make data recorded on a first filter have priority over other data on lower filters. On the other hand, if there are no relevant words or phrases in data recorded on the first filter, then the system will try to find relevance in data recorded on the second, third or lower filters in turn.

item.title: Types of data to be registered on filters
item.description: Two types of data, character data and words or phrases related to expression data are basic to be registered on filters. However, you can register a variety of data without them. For example, after you register temperature data from minus 20C until 50C in advance, you can combine a phrase that suggests more than 25C in a message with character data that express sweating. On the contrary when a phrase that suggests less than 10C is used, character data that express freezing can be combined with the phrase.

item.title: Distributing expression data for characters
item.description: Everybody can easily distribute a variety of expression and action data for characters to enjoy Cinematic Communication. Basically distribution from an online store for business or distribution by an individual creator without charge uses a same scheme. It is only putting data to distribute in a download site that you usually use. Please pay attention to a file name of each data at that time. For example, please name “pleasure” or “happy” on data expressing smile.

item.title: Sharing methods for how to direct characters
item.description: Considering personalities or features that your favorite characters have and which words or phrases can match with them in order to make the most effective expression is one of pleasures of enjoying Cinematic Communication. When you can make the best combination, we understand that you wish to save and reuse it later. When you can actually write a good message or sentence to make your character act as you wish, you can easily save the method for how to direct your character, refer to and reuse it later.

item.title: Technical approaches
item.description: Cinematic Communication has unique ideas to connect tightly between creators and users making use of common web and online technologies as much as possible. As representative, Pay Forward and Trust Alliance scheme are good examples. These schemes can bring their feature into full play through cooperation with social approaches.

item.title: Scheme of Pay Forward
item.description: One of features that Cinematic Communication has is thinking about the feeling of your communication partner and there is a scheme to support this feature. The scheme is Pay Forward. It makes character data that you own available free to your friends or family members. Any members who are registered in your friend list can use character data that you own to communicate with you as long as you agree to let them use.

item.title: Trust Alliance scheme
item.description: By means of Trust Alliance scheme, as long as users keep exchanging a public key that is necessary to encrypt a set of data for Cinematic Communication including character data with only partners that they can trust, they can also technically respect the right of character data that creators made. Heartfelt and lively communication with only reliable partners matches with the features of Cinematic Communication and it sounds logical for most of them.

item.title: Relationships between users and character data
item.description: Relationships between users and character data are explained by the following example. User A Character data “a” that User A owns User B Character data “b” that User B owns User C Character data “c” that User C owns User A and User B are good friends and have already registered each other’s ID in their own friend list. User B and User C are good friends and have already registered each other’s ID in their own friend list.

item.title: The right of character data
item.description: As one of aims that Cinematic Communication has, it tries to promote creative activities and establish Win-Win relationships between creators and users shortening a distance between them. Regarding the right of character data, it also considers to establish Win-Win relationships between them. It has a scheme to be highly convenient for both creators and users taking an approach from both technical and social sides. Technical approach Through the scheme of Pay Forward, your friends and family members registered in your friend list can freely use character data that you own to enjoy Cinematic Communication.

item.title: Social approach
item.description: We as developers for Cinematic Communication have a track record of supporting carrier educational activities that aim to foster the next generation of creators and users in a public elementary school more than 10 years. What the creators mean here includes not only professionals who are working in media and content industries but also persons who can exercise their creativity that is expected in any types of workplaces. What the users mean here includes not only the audience of movie but also persons who can definitely assess the social, economical and cultural value of creative activities and the results.

item.title: Now is the time when everybody can be a creator
item.description: Cinematic Communication will promote cooperation between creators and users and create more attractive characters and their expression. While the ability of computer is rapidly increasing, on the contrary the price is drastically going down year by year, a hurdle to try a variety of expressive activities is lowered. While respecting cultural diversity is held up as a primary condition in order to develop the world community, it serves as the driving force to create new contents.

item.title: Connecting between creators and users
item.description: Cinematic Communication can shorten the distance between creators and users. Through Cinematic Communication, users can feel more familiar with an excellent ability to express that professional creators possess. For users, Cinematic Communication can provide them more opportunities to enjoy works made by creators. For creators, shortening the distance with users through Cinematic Communication will be important more than before. An animation industry has already reached the level to produce high quality works more or less than live action films through advanced division of labor system.

item.title: Importance of fostering users
item.description: For example, behind the US gigantic media and content market we can see a number of creators who produce enough works to match the size of the market and a huge number of users who are keen audiences to sustain the market. Most of Americans are given a chance to create an audiovisual work as a creator in public educational activities and the experience leads to foster their eyes to evaluate the value of creative activities and works as the result.

item.title: Experience of admitting the value of creativity
item.description: The most effective way to admit the value of creativeness is to experience creative activities. A part of profits that Cinematic Communication can yield will be used to provide children educational opportunities to increase their creativeness. It means that users can directly contribute to the educational opportunities for fostering children’s creativeness. On the other words, they can invest in the future of creative activities. The reason why Cinematic Communication was developed is to provide these kinds of educational opportunities in the background.

item.title: Carrier educational activities
item.description: We as developers for Cinematic Communication have a history to keep supporting carrier educational activities that aim to foster the next generation of creators and users cooperating with Japanese major animation studios for more than 10 years. Every year around 60 to 100 sixth graders in an elementary school joined these educational activities and produced original short animation films at a group unit following professional animation production procedure. The report for FY 2015 carrier educational activities with academic analysis is uploaded on the following URL.

item.title: Independent Animation Festival
item.description: Some of animation works produced by elementary school students under carrier educational activities that we as developers for Cinematic Communication keep supporting have been sent to Independent Animation Festival sponsored by Mitaka city government and nearby major animation studios for 10 years. About Independent Animation Festival The festival is an annual event and aims to discover and support new talent who will work for the future of an animation industry.

item.title: UNESCO Salon Films Competition
item.description: We as developers for Cinematic Communication supported to send an animation work produced by elementary school students through Carrier Educational Activities to UNESCO Salon Films Competition that was held in 2014. About UNESCO Salon Films Competition The UNESCO Salon Video Competition is organized by Salon Films (H.K.) Ltd in the policy framework of “the UN Decade of Education for Sustainable Development (DESD, 2005-2014)” coordinated by UNESCO. UNESCO Salon Films Competition Official site

item.title: Teenage Walkers Project
item.description: One of developers for Cinematic Communication has experience to provide opportunities for teenagers who have different cultural backgrounds to know each other through online communication in US, Japan and Singapore as one of the first cases in the world. About Teenage Walkers Project Considering the scale of the activity and the educational consequence, Teenage Walkers Project implemented from 1997 until 1999 would be regarded as one of first successful cases utilizing ICT for cross-cultural communication program.
